thumb.description: 下記リンクにて、この動画内のBGMを販売しています！The background music in this video is for sale at the link below!👉https://bgms.booth.pm/items/6855668----This channel is officially certified by Google as a YouTube Artist Channel (OAC), and you can confirm our status by the ♪ mark displayed next to our channel name.----🎧Youtube music👉https://youtu.be/dlPBLxj1ivI🎧Spotify👉https://open.spotify.com/intl-ja/artist/6VLPxVwd1q9orMwrazrYll 🎧Apple Music👉https://music.apple.com/jp/artist/1804546728 🎧Amazon Music👉https://music.amazon.co.jp/artists/B0F2HZSZT6/honorable-japanese-song ----#lo-fi #j-pop #pop #japanesemusic #animemusic #lo-fibeats #chillbeats #chillmusic #relaxingmusic #studymusic #backgroundmusic #japaneselo-fi #jpoplo-fi #instrumental #japanesepopmusic #chillhop #studybeats #relaxingbeats #8bit #chiptune #instrumental
